title: As ISIS Expands Its Control, U.S. Policy Is Questioned
teaser: The so-called Islamic State captured two strategic cities recently: Ramadi, Iraq, and Palmyra, Syria. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks to Vali Nasr of Johns Hopkins about the U.S. strategy toward ISIS.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
